name: AddProductImage
description:
Add a new image to a specific product.

This tool is used to add a new image to an existing product in a store's e-commerce catalog. It should be called when you need to update the product's visual information by uploading an additional image.

parameters.name: store_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the store where the product is hosted. Required to specify which store's catalog you are updating.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the product in the store. Required to specify which product the image will be added to.

value_schema.description: The id for the product of a store.

parameters.name: product_image_id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the product image to be added.

value_schema.description: A unique identifier for the product image.

parameters.name: product_image_url
parameters.description: The URL of the image to be added to the product.

value_schema.description: The URL for a product image.

parameters.name: product_variant_ids
parameters.description: List of product variant IDs using the image.

value_schema.description: The list of product variants using the image.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: The id for the product of a store.

value_schema.description: The id for the product of a store.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the product image.

value_schema.description: A unique identifier for the product image.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL for a product image.

value_schema.description: The URL for a product image.

parameters.name: variant_ids
parameters.description: The list of product variants using the image.

value_schema.description: The list of product variants using the image.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
